name: The Basbodius
description:
Controls

WASD to Move

Q to Lock Gun

R to Reset

Any other key (preferably E) to Pass

Plot

The crisis has arrived. It's all up to you 'The Basbodius'. 'The Zoorers' keep on coming to conquer the lands. 'The Wiz' gave you few potions to assist. 

Now, An endless battle awaits...

Tips

The game might feel discouraging at first but once you get the hang of it, it is really fun(at least for me).

The Basbodius(character) moves first followed by the projectile and then the Zoorers(enemy). This data allows to make really good strategies.

The first number at top represents active score, the second represents the highest score in this playthrough and the final represents all time best score.

The game takes place on an invisible grid so take your time to calculate as many times the projectile will go through the enemy.

Just curious what's your personal best mine is 12.

Developed by 1111Someone11
